alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 30 at 8:23AM EDT until July 30 at 8:35PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson affecting Breathitt County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Jackson. * WHEN...Until this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 33.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The river crested at an all time record 43.5 feet early Friday morning. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 4.0 feet early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 33.0 feet on 01/23/1920. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued 12 PM EDT.
